an9.62:1.1: “Nava, bhikkhave, dhamme appahaya abhabbo arahattam sacchikatum.
an9.62:1.3: Ragam, dosam, moham, kodham, upanaham, makkham, palasam, issam, macchariyam—
an9.62:1.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, nava dhamme appahaya abhabbo arahattam sacchikatum.
an9.62:2.1: Nava, bhikkhave, dhamme pahaya bhabbo arahattam sacchikatum.
an9.62:2.3: Ragam, dosam, moham, kodham, upanaham, makkham, palasam, issam, macchariyam—
an9.62:2.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, nava dhamme pahaya bhabbo arahattam sacchikatun”ti.
